channel.title: Staff icon/rights help part one: help with both get rewarded part
channel.description:
[font=arial][size=8pt][b] :D you choose reward after helping me with all of the following; you can choose between 4m rsgp 5 dollars paypal or 6 dollars e-gold:)[/b][/size][/font] [center]*icons* []how do you code, icons into your server []whats a site to get staff crowns []which file are staff crowns, icons and <img=1,2,3,4,5> or @cr1@ @cr2@ coded in. [left]how do i fix the multi item thing when i right click an item it shows this santa hat santa hat santa hat santa hat santa hat wear eximine drop cancle santa hat santa hat [/left] please help me fix this.....
I am using [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442490.msg3993297.html#msg3993297]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442490.msg3993297.html#msg3993297[/url] And could really use assistance... how do i block bombs cheat client?
I really want the help with staff crowns in yell titles and getting staff crowns in my spirites and in my client files in my client. I want them to funtion properly its a 317 server [/center]
